title: Implement Simple Utility Function
goal: Create a reusable utility function that performs a specific task, such as string manipulation or data transformation, and integrate it into the existing codebase
inScope: Designing the function signature and parameters
Writing unit tests for the function
Integrating the function into the existing codebase
acceptanceCriteria: The function is correctly implemented and works as expected
The function has proper documentation and comments
The function is properly tested with unit tests
The function is integrated into the existing codebase without breaking existing functionality
